long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As a Creator you can use the Klarna Creator Platform Chrome extension when visiting any store connected with this service to:

1. Get an Klarna Creator short link to earn money when you drive traffic/sales for any product on the storeâ€™s site.
